inclusion.criterion: urinary tract symptoms and previous treatment modalities
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: vital signs monitoring, general physical examinations of all systems (including digital rectal examination), serum prostatic specific antigen (PSA), and urinalysis
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: record Patient Perception of Bladder Condition (PPBC), IPSS (IPSS-T, IPSS-V, IPSS-S), Overactive Bladder Symptom Score (OAB-SS), and quality of Life index (QoL-I)scores
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: obtain maximum flow rate (Qmax), voided volume, postvoid residual volume (PVR), total prostate volume (TPV), and transitional zone index (TZI)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: vital signs monitoring and record adverse events
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: record PPBC, IPSS (IPSS-T, IPSS-V, IPSS-S), OAB-SS and QoL
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: check urinalysis for urinary tract infection if patient has symptoms suggestive of urinary tract infection
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: check Qmax, voided volume, and PVR
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: patients with severe cardiopulmonary disease and such as congestive heart failure, arrhythmia, poorly controlled hypertension, not able to receive regular follow-up
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: patients with urinary retention, urodynamically proven detrusor underactivity or PVR ≥250 mL
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: patients with known active urinary tract infection, urinary stone or malignancy
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: patients with history of urethral injury or transurethral surgery for prostate or bladder
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient is a 55 year old man visiting his primary care physician for lower urinary tract symptoms including frequency, urgency, weak stream, incomplete emptying and intermittent flow for the past 9 months.
